title: Foundations of Visualization Recommendation Systems: Creative Approaches for Data Insight Exploration [Large-Scale]

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental understanding of data analysis and visualization
context.additional_context: Conducted in a language-subject-integrated project-based learning environment

learning_goals: Explain three visualization strategies for deriving key insights from diverse datasets
Understand the basic principles of VRS (Visualization Recommendation System) tools and apply them to real data
Present two quantitative criteria for evaluating the effectiveness of generated visualizations
Discuss the limitations and improvement directions of non-expert visualization tools
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
